name: paint attack
description:
This is for paintjam 2017 but I just couldnt fix the bugs to make the shooting work properly, and like didnt get onto the spray or the paint tool

But still you can see the idea i am going for. You will need msvc 2015 redist installed, I have uploaded those in the file vcredist2015_32_64.rar you can also download here: https://www.microsoft.com/en-au/download/details.a...
